result.arabic_text: أَمۡ تَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ يَسۡمَعُونَ أَوۡ يَعۡقِلُونَۚ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا كَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ بَلۡ هُمۡ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
result.translation: Do you think that most of them hear or understand?[22] They are just like cattle[23], rather they are further astray from the right way.
result.footnotes:
[22] They follow others blindly.
 [23] i.e., like livestock or sheep, that follow without asking wherever they are led.
